name: Carnival of the Damned
description: Once a vibrant amusement park, now a decaying playground for the infected. The rusting roller coasters loom like skeletal remains, while fungal growths pulsate through the ticket booths. The carnival games now serve as macabre traps, and the Ferris wheel creaks ominously in the wind. Survivors whisper about something unnatural lurking in the funhouse mirrors.

points_of_interest.name: Main Gate
points_of_interest.description: Collapsed ticket booths with fungal vines growing through the turnstiles

points_of_interest.name: Haunted Mansion
points_of_interest.description: Now actually haunted by fungal-infected former employees

points_of_interest.name: Ferris Wheel
points_of_interest.description: Partially collapsed, with infected trapped in some gondolas

points_of_interest.name: Food Court
points_of_interest.description: Rotten concession stands that might still contain canned goods

points_of_interest.name: Roller Coaster
points_of_interest.description: Twisted metal track with infected hanging from the loops

points_of_interest.name: Funhouse
points_of_interest.description: Distorted mirrors hide something unnatural in the reflections

points_of_interest.name: Maintenance Shed
points_of_interest.description: Potential tools and parts, but watch for infected workers

special_features: fungal growths that react to movement
distorted funhouse mirrors that show glimpses of the future
roller coaster that can be used as an escape route
